content.question: Is your marriage certificate in English?
content.helpText1: If your certificate contains an English version as part of the original certificate, select 'yes'.
content.helpText2: If you have an English translation as a different document, select 'no'.
content.certifiedTranslation: Do you have a certified translation of your marriage certificate?
content.cyaCertifiedTranslation: Do you have a translation of your marriage certificate?
content.certifiedDescription: Translations must be certified as a true and accurate translation by the translator or by a notary public.

certificateInEnglish.required: Select yes if your marriage certificate is in English

certifiedTranslation.required: Select yes if you have a certified translation of your marriage certificate
